skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: speech therapy practice
Developer Terms of Use
des: Created by a licensed Speech Language Pathologist. This skill provides exercises to Speech Pathologists like basic who what, opposites, colors, and yes no questions. This skill is to be used by Speech Pathologists during therapy. We do not store information about users of this skill. This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
